quest.Name: Life Untethered
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= delved deep into far-off ruins and uncovered the trail leading to a legendary Animate Rebel.

step.Name: Find a clue as to the Rebel Animate's whereabouts
step.text: Travel to the last rumored location of a rebellious animated being and search for a clue as to where they went.

quest.Name: An Animated Refuge
quest.Accomplishment: Spoke with someone in the know.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= spoke with a rambler and discovered a remote encampment.

step.Name: Speak to a Neuroparent
step.text: The Animated Servants speak of a camp they've visited, but they don't seem to know how to navigate there. Find someone who might know more.

quest.Name: Find Safra
quest.Accomplishment: You found a legendary angry basket.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, =name= revived a cold trail and found the legendary animate basket, {{dreamsmoke|Safra}}.

step.Name: Find Safra, Legendary Animate
step.text: Spurred on by Yurl's instructions, travel to the ruins to find the legendary animated being, {{dreamsmoke|Safra}}.
